productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: The orthopedic seat cushion has a U-shaped design that helps to elevate pressure on the lower back, hips, tailbone, coccyx, and more. It is made of high-density foam that contours to your body and provides support and comfort. The cushion has a removable, washable cover and comes with a strap for easy transport and secure adjustment. It is recommended by orthopedic surgeons and doctors across the globe.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: To remove the cover from your memory foam, simply unzip it and remove it from the foam. The cover is machine washable on a gentle cycle with cold water. You can also put it in the Dryer on a low heat setting, or simply air dry it. However, do not put the memory foam itself in the washer or dryer, as this could damage the foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent aide after back surgery.
reviews.reviewText: Gave this product as a gift to my sister after her back surgery. She finds it comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my elderly mother with a wound and she loves it. It has an adjustable strap for the dining room chair, wheel chair and car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Ok , the cushion feels fine , seems very comfortable and looks very nice , but then again it’s still brand new . However I do have a gripe . For some reason our buddies in Beijing feel like they need to apply a 2 inch by 3 inch sticker with what must be Gorilla glue on the suede top of the cushion . It doesn’t have any important information about the cushion , it simply lets the new owner , this side up , I’ll admit to only a high school education but really , if I was not able to figure that out then I should not be behind the wheel of the truck I installed this in . I spent an hour trying to get all of the sticker off without tearing up the cover .. can’t really say after picking , scraping, brushing , hot air and ice cubes I failed to get everything off . Please call our buddies and tell them to put the sticker on the plastic bottom . At least there , it really doesn’t need to come off . The cushion does work fine though and the seller has been very responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like cherubs are lifting my bumbum.
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how else to say it. I work from home so I'm sitting quite a bit, I got a standing desk, which helps, but was dealing with cumulative soreness in my hip joints that made the end of the work week terrible. I tried replacing my desk chair but as anyone knows that's really hit or miss, dropping a bunch of cash on something that you hope will work out...well, this time it didn't. The chair I got is not really that comfortable or supportive. Womp womp. I had a similarly shaped regular foam cushion that was getting flat and warped and hard that I've been using to try and make this loser chair work, but it was clear that it wasn't getting the job done. The backs of my thighs would be sore from the pressure of sitting on the edge of the seat and it was just overall miserable. Rather than buy yet another new chair I found this seat cushion. I have come to really love memory foam, it is magical stuff in a mattress so I thought I'd give this a shot.Let me just say from the very first time I sat on this cushion the difference was night and day. It feels very firm initially, but as your, um, tuckus warms up the foam it molds into the shape of your peaches. The edges of the cushion compress without lacking support, ending the cut off feeling I would get in the backs of my legs my from the edge of my chair and my old cushion. The more I sit, the more I don't feel any soreness. It is just short of a miracle. If I can use this cushion to get some more value out of this cruddy chair I bought it is well worth the cost.The best thing about memory foam is that it springs back up when you're not using it, so when you sit again later you sink in all over again. These magical cherubs fly back up and gently lift your hiney, cradling it so it's kept snug but without the pressure on your hips.I would say if you are at all on the fence about how good this cushion is, especially compared to others that may look similar but aren't made of memory foam, go for it. You have nothing to lose and cherub bum to gain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is very firm but seems a little short in length for me as I am tall. But other wise it seems well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me it’s too hard
reviews.reviewText: I have really bad back issues and I needed a very cushy cushion and this isn’t cushy enough for me. It is made with memory foam and it does spring back just not enough softness to prevent my pain. Seems to be made very well and it’s fairly inexpensive. I am going to hold onto it to possibly use down the road when I’m in a bit less pain and healthier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely a great purchase! I gave mine to my husband and replaced with an inferior seat - oh what a mistake! I had to buy an additional one and I was so happy when it arrived!Never again will I give mine up! If you're thinking about purchasing one this is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for my kayak, but it didn't work well with my kayak seat. So I decided to try it for my office chair and I love it! Its super comfortable and adds just the right amount of cusion to my seat. Using it along with the mesh back support has really improved the comfort of my chair. Its also improved my posture. The customer service was excellent! They sent me the mesh back support for free after I registered my product. Its one of the best free gifts i've ever gotten. I highly recommed!

This is a very comfortable cushion, but I am trying everything I can to contact the seller, as I have found that my seat has collapsed at the front. The memory foam has gone flat.Does anyone know how to contact the seller?
1. You have NO option to contact the seller2. It was delivered, I placed it on my chair, and after sitting on it for 1 day, it permanently damaged by leather chair. Look at image.
